entry.title: Arisen The Bat
entry.summary:
Author: dexpair

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,880Chapters: 9/71Kudos: 8

Summary: On the streets of a Neo Gotham, old man Bruce Wayne lived his life as quite as possible. No more hero stuff, no more meetings with The League in space. His days were filled with silly conversations with his husband or listening to the dramas of his teenage son. It was an opposite reality to the one he had lived his whole life, but that's what made it special for him. However, on a special day, Bruce discovers that getting rid of his past life wouldn't be so easy. Ghosts from the past have returned, this time haunting his children, and The Dark Knight realizes he will have to act for his city and his family one last time.

entry.title: You can take the boy from the circus
entry.summary:
Author: Gotham_Blight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,995Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 277

Summary: Damian Al-Ghul Wayne had everything at one point. He was a prince. Ibn al Xu'ffasch. Son of the bat. Heir to the demon. He had never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his palace in Nanda Parbat. He had never asked to be shipped to a gloomy, grey city. Even when his father kept taking in orphans and ruining his plans for inheritance, Damian stood steadfast. But then his father died, leaving behind his newest orphan. A tiny acrobat with watery blue eyes and black curls, who spoke no English. Damian knew the boy never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his circus troupe. Damian knew he needed to be there for him.

entry.title: You believe me like a God, I'll Destroy you like I am
entry.summary:
Author: holding_the_world_on_my_back

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,415Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 23

Summary: The people of Earth are simple and confused. Rule without mercy.The words echoed despite having nothing to bounce off of but the tightening walls of shock and disbelief that choked Superman as the message played on every phone and billboard within the gathering yet distant crowd. They kept a distance like a wild animal that was only caged by a flimsy rope it could chew through any moment.Gotham was flooded. Riddler was contained and under constant surveillance, but that didn't stop the consequences of his actions. Extremists, destroyed neighborhoods, violent criminals. Batman had his claws dug into falling sand through an hourglass. It was only a matter of time before he fell, too. The broadcast that had betrayed the world, the man that had betrayed him, only widened the abysmal hole for him drown in, choked by doubts and regret and sand.Putting personal feelings aside, Batman held to that vow that held his heart the way the cowl held his pride: Protect. No love, no man would stop him from lining his heart with lead and his weapons with Kryptonite.

entry.title: From Gotham with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,913Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 105

Summary: Martha and Thomas Wayne are Gotham’s golden couple—wealthy, admired, and untouchable. Their daughter, Beatrice, is the heart of their legacy. But one night shatters everything. The Waynes are murdered in cold blood, and young Beatrice vanishes without a trace. Two years later, she returns. Alive—but not the same. Now, Gotham must face the mystery of the girl who came back... and the shadows that followed her home.

entry.title: Clinging to What's Lost
entry.summary:
Author: Dracula4life

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,718Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 39

Summary: Jason Todd thought he had moved past the pain of his past. Willis and Catherine were far behind him, along with the Joker and a year of torture. But when Jason comes home to his husband Roy overdosing on the couch, he realizes that the life he worked for was falling from his fingertips with each passing moment."Jason considered himself a pretty happy person. He lived with his charming husband Roy, and their adorable daughter Lian, and Jason went to Wayne Manor every Sunday for dinner. He and Bruce were as close as they could be, and Jason called his siblings every few weeks to catch up. Alfred was getting older, but Jason would still visit to help cook. Jason’s joking reference to Clark as ‘Pops’ had turned less sarcastic with each remark.So of course something had to screw things up."

entry.title: Valentine's in Black and Red
entry.summary:
Author: Holdt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,276Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Bruce Wayne never planned for Clark. He planned for contingencies, for kryptonite, for what to do when gods fall out of the sky—not for standing between Superman and a kryptonite cannon on Valentine’s night. When Lex Luthor turns Bruce’s failsafes into a planetary Phantom Zone trap, Clark is forced to choose between the man he loves and the rest of the world…and Bruce refuses to let love be Lex’s weapon.
